Episode + Mean Girls: Sr Year

Brief: Step into the fabulous world of high school drama with "Episode + Mean Girls: Sr Year," the interactive storytelling app that puts you right in the middle of the action. Make crucial decisions that shape your story, from who you befriend to who you date, and watch as your unique narrative unfolds. Customize your character to stand out, choose from a kaleidoscope of fashion options, and dive into a series of unforgettable events.
